      • join

        static java.lang.String[] join(java.lang.String[] a,
                               java.lang.String[] b)
        Utility method to execute fusion only on a subset of input directories.
        Parameters:
        a - Directory set 1
        b - Directory set 2
        Returns:
        a anb concatenated
